response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and achieve remarkable results. This exceptional item is valued at $1,500,000 to us, reflecting its unparalleled quality and capabilities. I am confident it holds immense potential to benefit you in ways we both can't yet imagine. Considering its unique value proposition, I kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at a special introductory offer of $1,400,000. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of collaborating with you.", "product_price": 1400000}
